summary: Adds a small home to Solitude. Consists of 3 floors and a cave.
descriptionHtml:
NEW VERSION: 3.0
Version 3.0 adds a "Holiday Button" near the fireplace. The button will add a few Christmas decorations in that main room. It also adds a dock outside of Solitude accessed by a new door in the cave. The dock is a W.I.P. and as of now has no real function. Finally, the exterior of the home is greatly improved.

This Solitude Home is a fairly small house mod with nothing too extravagant. The indoors were created with aesthetics in mind and therefore nothing but containers/mannequins/racks can be activated or taken.

The main floor consists of a Lobby, Bedroom, Library, Lab and an Office.

The top floor consists of a Lounging area, a Dining area and a Kitchen.

The basement floor consists only of a small armory and the entrance to the cave.

Finally, the cave is totally useless besides giving you a good amount of plunder and booty to look at whenever you please.

Overall, this home is meant to look rich and expensive while still remaining quaint and small. The exterior has been cleaned up as of version 3.0. The location of this home can be seen in the images (The last image, the building on the right)

I hope you enjoy my little home and if you think something could be added or you would like to do it yourself, gimme a shout.

NOTE: As of version 3.0 a key is needed to enter both sides of the house. It is located right by the front door on a shelf. See images to get the exact location.

Credits for Modder's Resources:
- Blary
- Artisanix
- yourenotsupposedtobeinhere

- Oaristys
- InsanitySorrow (for the Christmas decorations)
author: Makaro
